text: My wife has critical LES(Lupus)+Systemic Scleroderma+Rheumatic Arthritis. She was kept alive (since 1984) by #Chloroquine. It had, used for malaria prevention, kept me healthy for 163 trips to tropical countries. BTW: I used it (on CDC advise) for viral infections, too. #SUCCESS https://t.co/6mWFw7Xgk2
